def spy(string):
    n = 0
    s = ''
    while True:
        if string[n] in 'aeiou':
            s += string[n]
            n += 3
        elif string[n] == '\n':
            break
        else:
            s += string[n]
            n += 1
    return s

import sys

print spy(sys.stdin.readline())
